brief_summary.textblock:
The primary purpose of this protocol is to make arbekacin available for treatment of
      patients with infections caused by multidrug-resistant organisms when treatment with other
      antibiotics cannot be used due to unavailability, intolerance, contraindications, or
      treatment non-response.

clinical_study.brief_title: Arbekacin Treatment of Adult Patients With Infections Caused by Multidrug-resistant Bacteria

intervention.description: Intravenous arbekacin in a total daily dose of 5-7 mg/kg

facility.name: Walter Reed National Military Medical Center (WRNMMC)
